arts.ttl: England squad announcement LIVE: Thomas Tuchel set to name players for first World Cup qualifiers
arts.sum: The new England manager will hold a press conference after announcing his first Three Lions squad ahead of World Cup qualifiers against Albania and Latvia at Wembley

arts.ttl: Dewsbury-Hall ensures Chelsea ease past FC Copenhagen but doubts remain
arts.sum: The Conference League is supposed to be where Chelsea live a little. This is a long way below Europe’s elite and fans expect their team to overwhelm opponents who operate in much smaller financial circles. They are waiting for Enzo Maresca to prove his positional play can dazzle. This was another strange Stamford Bridge occasion. The mood was muted, even though Chelsea advanced to a last-eight clash with Legia Warsaw by beating FC Copenhagen 3-1 on aggregate. A fourth consecutive win in all competitions was not without its complications and that meant the doubts around Maresca are not going away before Sunday’s trip to Arsenal. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Chelsea advance past FC Copenhagen despite woeful first-half display
arts.sum: Chelsea moved into the UEFA Conference League quarter-finals with a 3-1 aggregate victory over FC Copenhagen after earning a 1-0 win in the second leg despite not having a shot during a dreadful first-half performance at Stamford Bridge.

arts.ttl: Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall seals Chelsea’s Conference League progress
arts.sum: Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall’s goal shortly after half-time was a rare highlight.

arts.ttl: Exclusive: FC Copenhagen to Release Special 150th Anniversary Kit in 2026
arts.sum: Footy Headlines can exclusively leak that Adidas will release a special shirt to celebrate the 150th anniversary of Copenhagen (1876-2026) in 2026.

arts.ttl: Palmer benched for Chelsea vs FC Copenhagen LIVE!
arts.sum: And he also said there was positive news on Romeo Lavia's return towards full fitness - although he is not in the Conference League squad. Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca has confirmed Cole Palmer, Reece James and Christopher Nkunku are back in training after illness.

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs FC Copenhagen – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Chelsea host FC Copenhagen in the Europa Conference League this evening with a place in the quarter-finals on offer. Enzo Maresca’s side have a one-goal advantage from the first leg last week. Reece James and Enzo Fernandez were on the scoresheet as Chelsea claimed a 2-1 win in the Danish capital. arts.ttl: Chelsea vs FC Copenhagen – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Chelsea welcome FC Copenhagen to Stamford Bridge tonight for the second leg of their Europa Conference League Round of 16 tie. The Blues triumphed last Thursday by recording a 2-1 victory at Parken with Reece James and Enzo Fernandez finding the net.
